mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rank_id AS "rank.id", r.name AS "rank.name", a.dimension_id AS "dimension.id", d.propKey AS "dimension.propKey", d.name AS "dimension.name", d.weight AS "dimension.weight", d.description AS "dimension.description", a.priority AS "priority", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_rank r ON r.id = a.rank_id LEFT JOIN mod_item_dimension d ON d.id = a.dimension_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO int_rank_item_dimension( id, rank_id, dimension_id, priority, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rank.id}, #{dimension.id}, #{priority}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE int_rank_item_dimension SET rank_id = #{rank.id}, dimension_id = #{dimension.id}, priority = #{priority}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
